source_caption_data.pre_caption: This time-lapse video captures a powerful thunderstorm at night. The primary motion consists of dramatic flashes of lightning that repeatedly illuminate a massive cloud formation from within, revealing its turbulent structure against a starry sky. In the distance, the dark silhouettes of mountains and the faint glow of city lights are visible on the horizon.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This time-lapse video captures a powerful thunderstorm at night. The primary motion consists of dramatic flashes of lightning that repeatedly illuminate a massive cloud formation from within, revealing its turbulent structure against a starry sky. In the distance, the dark silhouettes of mountains and the faint glow of city lights are visible on the horizon.

bad_caption: This time-lapse video shows a busy highway during the day. Cars and trucks move steadily along multiple lanes, occasionally changing lanes and overtaking each other. In the background, tall office buildings rise above the road, while pedestrians cross a nearby intersection. The sky remains clear and blue throughout the sequence.
